channel.title: Comments on: Movies on a USB Key

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Their CEO gave a great presentation at the IBM Innovation Centre Launch. Deeply negative about trying to grow and finance a business in Ireland but lots of interesting lessons. The partnership with IBM seems to have worked very well for them.
item.content:encoded: Their CEO gave a great presentation at the IBM Innovation Centre Launch. Deeply negative about trying to grow and finance a business in Ireland but lots of interesting lessons. The partnership with IBM seems to have worked very well for them.
